name: Windchaser
simple_desc: Increases Movement Speed. After attacking an enemy and entering battle, receive 2 stacks of Roaring Bowstrings.
desc: After using her Technique, Yukong enters Sprint mode for #1[i] seconds. In Sprint mode, her Movement SPD increases by #2[i]%, and Yukong gains #3[i] stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" when she enters battle by attacking enemies.
